features: TARGET BACTERIA: SkinSmart targets the #1 problem in chronic wounds—bacteria. Safely remove bacteria without irritating skin or wounds, or interfering with your skin’s natural healing process
ACCELERATES HEALING. Great for burns, rashes, boils, tattoos, and piercings. Use after cosmetic procedures and for post-op recovery. Safe for daily use
DELIVERS THE ANTIMICROBIAL HEALING BENEFITS OF HYPOCHLOROUS in a simple spray. A safe alternative to chlorohexidine, alcohol, and harsh antiseptics
ALL-NATURAL HYPOCHLOROUS IS USED IN WOUND CENTERS AND BURN UNITS, now available in SkinSmart for at-home care, No rX required!
SKINSMART SOLUTIONS: Our skin products provide relief & promote healing from the symptoms of minor skin conditions & irritations such as eczema, diaper rash, wounds, , burns, & more
body.description: SkinSmart Antimicrobial Wound Therapy Spray SkinSmart Antimicrobial Accelerates Healing by Removing Bacteria New spray addresses critical factor in wound care—bacterial contamination. Accelerate healing by targeting the #1 problem in wound care, unwanted bacteria. Formulated for daily use to maintain a bacteria-free wound. Made for hard-to-heal wounds, rashes, burns, boils---even bed sores. Prescription-strength formula -- now available at home. Same formula used in wound clinics for burns, foot ulcers, and post-op recovery. SkinSmart is formulated for frequent, daily use, and does not need to be rinsed off skin. Alternative to traditional antiseptics, which can damage skin in the long term. *one month and older

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The convenient way to follow Dr's orders for foot hygiene and amputation prevention. Simple, sanitary antimicrobial care—ideal for caregivers. SkinSmart Antimicrobial Wound Therapy Spray SkinSmart Antimicrobial Accelerates Healing by Removing Bacteria New spray addresses critical factor in wound care—bacterial contamination. Accelerate healing by targeting the #1 problem in wound care, unwanted bacteria. Formulated for daily use to maintain a bacteria-free wound. Made for hard-to-heal wounds, rashes, burns, boils---even bed sores. Prescription-strength formula -- now available at home. Same formula used in wound clinics for burns, foot ulcers, and post-op recovery. SkinSmart is formulated for frequent, daily use, and does not need to be rinsed off skin. Alternative to traditional antiseptics, which can damage skin in the long term. *one month and older

Doctors know: Keeping your wound bacteria-free is critical for proper healing SkinSmart safely removes bacteria from hard-to-heal wounds, burns, and boils without interfering with your skin’s natural healing process. SkinSmart safely tackles blistered skin, acne, rashes, hives, and can be used in post-op recovery. Did you know that traditional antiseptics, like iodine, can damage skin cells? SkinSmart helps heal without irritating or harming dry or damaged skin. SkinSmart is recommended as a daily foot wash for diabetic patients with at-risk feet. This convenient spray makes it easy to help avoid infections that may lead to dangerous medical problems—including amputation. This clear spray is not sticky, won’t sting, and will not stain clothes or bedding. SkinSmart is safe for frequent, everyday use.

See Now See Now See Now SkinSmart Wound Therapy Perineal Cleanser Daily Foot Cleanser Theraputic Benefit Everyday spray for eyelid bumps, itchy rashes, pressure wounds, and skin infections Spray to fight adult diaper rash, prevent UTIs, and control odor Daily cleansing for diabetic feet. Spray to help prevent infection, and cleanse bacteria from feet. Great for toenail fungus too. Safe for sensitive skin ✓ ✓ ✓ Rinse-free ✓ ✓ ✓ Trigger spray for hard to reach places ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helix piercing healing!
reviews.reviewText: After reading reviews I finally bought this for my helix piercing that wasn’t healing properly. It was red irritated and getting on my last nerves. After four days of using this product my ear is finally starting to heal.I only cleaned with a q-tip with water and the solution. I sprayed the solution front and back twice a day.Day 1/2- it caused a bump by the piercing, I cleaned with a q-tip only with water because I wanted to know if this product was truly worth to it.Day 3- the bump disappeared as well as the irritation and redness. Cleaned as usualDay 4- cleaned with water again, sprayed the solution. My piercing no longer hurts to touch.Also this product can be a little drying on the ear. I would use a light oil with a q-tip or your clean finger to apply lightly around the ear (not my piercing) after the solution is done drying. I am truly happy because I thought I would have to remove this, let it heal and pierce it later on!
